channel.title: Pages on Lets Automate It
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Lets Automate It

item.title: Open Source Projects
item.description: Below is a list of open-source projects I have started or contributed heavily to: speedtweet This docker-compose project will check your internet speed against a specified threshold and if below it will tweet at the provided account about your current internet speeds. Type: Docker slack-url-utils slack-url-utils is a slash command utility for Slack that obfuscates, deobfuscates, gets DNS information, and submits IOCs to AlienVault for a given URL.

item.title: Presentations
item.description: I have included a list below of my previous presentations and any relevant links. This will be continually updated moving forward: Presentation Slides Making MITRE ATT&CK Actionable (gif) (pdf) py-ews: A cross platform python package to interact with Exchange Web Services Hunting Phish Kits PowerShell vs Python: A side-by-side comparison Basics of Incident Handling Securing Windows with Group Policy Past Presentations Making MITRE ATT&CK Actionable - 2020 Hacker Halted py-ews: A cross platform python package to interact with Exchange Web Services - 2019 BSidesSTL Hunting Phish Kits - 2019 DerbyCon PowerShell vs Python: A side-by-side comparison - 2019 BSides Springfield (Missouri) - No Video SECURING WINDOWS WITH (SOME) GROUP POLICY – 2018 SHOWMECON SECURING WINDOWS WITH (SOME) GROUP POLICY – 2018 BSIDESKC MOTIVATIONS & TACTICS OF PHISHING – 2017 MORENET ANNUAL CONFERENCE SECURING WINDOWS WITH GROUP POLICY – 2017 DERBYCON BASICS OF INCIDENT RESPONSE – 2017 BSIDESSTL (2) HALF DAY POWERSHELL TRAINING COURSE FOR 80+ - 2017 MU VET MED PPRT: POWERSHELL PHISHING RESPONSE TOOLKIT – 2016 SHOWMECON PPRT: POWERSHELL PHISHING RESPONSE TOOLKIT – 2016 CIRCLE CITY CON SECURING WINDOWS WITH GROUP POLICY – 2015 MORENET ANNUAL CONFERENCE

item.title: About
item.description: Josh’s primary focus is in Windows security and PowerShell automation. He is a GIAC Certified Windows Security Administrator (GCWN) and GIAC Certified Forensic Analyst (GCFA). You can reach Josh at MSAdministrator.com or on Twitter at @MS_dministrator.
